turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm looking at my bill and I'm seeing a charge for $75 that I don't recognize. My account number is 1234567890. This is really frustrating, I've been a customer for years and never had this happen!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand your frustration. I've pulled up your account and I see the charge you're referring to. It's listed as a 'Premium Content Subscription'. Do you recall subscribing to any premium content through our platform?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Premium content? No! I would never subscribe to that. Besides, why would it be $75? That seems incredibly high. How are you even allowed to add charges like that without my explicit authorization? Is there a way to see exactly what content was supposedly subscribed to?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. I have removed the charge and issued a credit to your account. It may take 1-2 business days to reflect on your statement. I am unable to provide details about the specific content at this time but the charge has been removed. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
